rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IAR3117} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit builds on skills developed in previous studios and applies these to a range of focused projects that extend and explore transformational practices in interior architecture. In this studio successful project outcomes will be of a high intermediate level of complexity. They will provide an opportunity to integrate learning across the course with the development of responsive design practices. A number of focused studio projects will be offered.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
